description: This is the main entry point for a Flutter application, defining the root widget, theme, and home page.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget setting up the MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget serving as the home page displaying a message.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage managing the UI state.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the root widget and home page.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the home page in its current state.
